thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangxi Sanxin Medtec sees FY 2017 net profit up 10 pct to 20 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangxi Sanxin Medtec sees FY 2017 net profit up 10 pct to 20 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangxi sanxin medtec co ltd

text:
Jan 23(Reuters) - Jiangxi Sanxin Medtec Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 10 percent to 20 percent, or to be 40.3 million yuan to 43.9 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 36.6 million yuan
* Says increased income from main business is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ZVdQKS
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
